docTitle.titlePart: Synthetic Ambience in Parametric Stereo Coding

byline.docAuthor: Jonas Engdegård 1 , Heiko Purnhagen 1 , Jonas Rödén 1 , Lars Liljeryd 1

front.note: Correspondence should be addressed to Jonas Engdegård
front.div:
ABSTRACT
Parametric stereo coding in combination with an efficient coder for the underlying monaural audio signal results in
the most efficient coding scheme for stereo signals at very low bit rates available today. While techniques for lateral
localization have been studied since early intensity stereo coding tools, synthesis of stereophonic ambience was only
recently applied in parametric stereo coding systems. This paper studies different techniques for synthetic ambience
generation in the context of parametric stereo coding systems and discusses their mono-compatibility. Implementations
of these techniques in combination with mp3PRO and aacPlus are presented together with experimental results.
